personalInfo.name: Sairam Reddy Solleti
personalInfo.title: Full Stack Developer
personalInfo.summary: Full Stack Developer with a passion for AI and a drive to create impactful solutions. Skilled in JavaScript, PHP, and modern web technologies, I am dedicated to continuous learning and leveraging AI to solve complex problems. My goal is to innovate and deliver high-quality applications that make a difference.

experience.description: Liaised with cross-functional teams to address discrepancies, ensuring the prompt and adequate resolution of customer queries. Assisted in the implementation of new systems, policies, and processes, contributing to their successful adoption, and driving operational improvements.

projects.name: A Secure De-Centralized Protocol for Voting System
projects.description: Developed a secure, decentralized voting protocol based on blockchain technology to ensure the integrity and transparency of elections.

projects.name: Detection of Artificially Ripened Fruits
projects.description: Engineered an IoT device equipped with a gas detector and microcontroller to accurately measure ethylene gas levels, a key indicator of fruit ripeness.

projects.name: Developed a Webpage for Examinations Like JEE
projects.description: Designed and developed a comprehensive web-based platform for conducting online examinations similar to JEE, providing a seamless and efficient experience for both students and administrators.
